title: Cross my heart
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Smoking
abstract: A comical look at two girls who decide to give up smoking at the funeral of a friend
description: Two women attending a friend's funeral who died from cancer vow to quit smoking, cold turkey. There are obstacles in their way however, including a sister who has just split up with her partner, her son in tow. They instil a no smoking policy in the house with penalties for those who break the rules. Features salient points about the ill effects of smoking and the side effects you can expect when quitting. Cast includes: Marilyn O'Donnell, Parthena Amanatidis, Tamasin Ramsay, Brian Nankervis.
